mapper.sql: SELECT g.GROUND_ID, g.CODE_ID, g.MAP_ID, g.SAMPLE_NUMBER, g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME, g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME, g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME, g.SURVEY_TIME, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, g.ELEVATION, IFNULL(g.TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE ,"") TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE, IFNULL(g.SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE,"") SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE, IFNULL(g.ASCEPT_TYPE,"") ASCEPT_TYPE, g.FALLING_GRADIENT, IFNULL(g.SOIL_TYPE,"") SOIL_TYPE, IFNULL(g.GRASSLAND_TYPE,"") GRASSLAND_TYPE, g.VEGETATION_COVERAGE, g.ABOVE_GROUND_BIOMASS, IFNULL(g.SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE,"") SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE, IFNULL(g.MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE,"") MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE, IFNULL(g.NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE,"") NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE, g.NAME, g.PHOTO_URL, g.DEPT, g.CODE, CASE g.STAUTE WHEN '00' THEN '草稿' WHEN '01' THEN '审核中' WHEN '02' THEN '审核完成' WHEN '03' THEN '撤回' WHEN '04' THEN '退回' END AS STAUTE, g.CREATE_BY, g.CREATE_TIME, g.UPDATE_BY, g.UPDATE_TIME, p.PLOT_ID, p.GROUND_ID, p.SAMPLING_NUMBER, p.SAMPLING_AREA, p.HARMFUL_SPECIES_TYPE, p.DETAILED_TYPE, p.QUANTITY_DETERMINATION, p.PHOTO_URL, p.STANDARD_DENSITY, p.SAMPLING_TIME FROM c_ground_survey g LEFT JOIN c_plot p ON g.GROUND_ID = p.GROUND_ID

select g.GROUND_ID, g.CODE_ID,g.MAP_ID, g.SAMPLE_NUMBER, g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME, g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME, g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME, g.SURVEY_TIME, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, g.ELEVATION, g.TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE, g.SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE, g.ASCEPT_TYPE, g.FALLING_GRADIENT, g.SOIL_TYPE, g.GRASSLAND_TYPE, g.VEGETATION_COVERAGE, g.ABOVE_GROUND_BIOMASS, g.SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE, g.MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE, g.NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE, g.NAME, g.PHOTO_URL,g.DEPT,g.CODE, CASE g.STAUTE when '00' then '草稿' when '01' then '审核中' when '02' then '审核完成' when '03' then '撤回'when'04' then '退回' END AS STAUTE, g.CREATE_BY, g.CREATE_TIME, g.UPDATE_BY, g.UPDATE_TIME from c_ground_survey g

select g.GROUND_ID, g.CODE_ID,g.MAP_ID, g.SAMPLE_NUMBER, g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME, g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME, g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME, g.SURVEY_TIME, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, g.ELEVATION, g.TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE, g.SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE, g.ASCEPT_TYPE, g.FALLING_GRADIENT, g.SOIL_TYPE, g.GRASSLAND_TYPE, g.VEGETATION_COVERAGE, g.ABOVE_GROUND_BIOMASS, g.SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE, g.MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE, g.NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE, g.NAME, g.PHOTO_URL,g.DEPT,g.CODE, CASE g.STAUTE when '00' then '草稿' when '01' then '审核中' when '02' then '审核完成' when '03' then '撤回'when'04' then '退回' END AS STAUTE, g.CREATE_BY, g.CREATE_TIME,g.UPDATE_BY, g.UPDATE_TIME from c_ground_survey g

select g.GROUND_ID, g.CODE_ID,g.MAP_ID, g.SAMPLE_NUMBER, g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME, g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME, g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME, g.SURVEY_TIME, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, g.ELEVATION, g.TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE, g.SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE, g.ASCEPT_TYPE, g.FALLING_GRADIENT, g.SOIL_TYPE, g.GRASSLAND_TYPE, g.VEGETATION_COVERAGE, g.ABOVE_GROUND_BIOMASS, g.SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE, g.MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE, g.NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE, g.NAME, g.PHOTO_URL,g.DEPT,g.CODE, CASE g.STAUTE when '00' then '草稿' when '01' then '审核中' when '02' then '审核完成' when '03' then '撤回'when'04' then '退回' END AS STAUTE, g.CREATE_BY, g.CREATE_TIME,g.UPDATE_BY, g.UPDATE_TIME from c_ground_survey g
g.CODE LIKE concat('%', #{code}, '%') and g.STAUTE !=00 g.CODE_ID LIKE concat('%', #{codeId}, '%') and g.STAUTE !=00 and g.SAMPLE_NUMBER = #{sampleNumber} and g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME like concat('%', #{provincialLevelName}, '%') and g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME like concat('%', #{cityLevelName}, '%') and g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME like concat('%', #{countyLevelName}, '%')
mapper.select:
select g.GROUND_ID, g.CODE_ID,g.MAP_ID, g.SAMPLE_NUMBER, g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME, g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME, g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME, g.SURVEY_TIME, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, g.ELEVATION, g.TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE, g.SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE, g.ASCEPT_TYPE, g.FALLING_GRADIENT, g.SOIL_TYPE, g.GRASSLAND_TYPE, g.VEGETATION_COVERAGE, g.ABOVE_GROUND_BIOMASS, g.SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE, g.MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE, g.NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE, g.NAME, g.PHOTO_URL,g.DEPT,g.CODE, CASE g.STAUTE when '00' then '草稿' when '01' then '审核中' when '02' then '审核完成' when '03' then '撤回'when'04' then '退回' END AS STAUTE, g.CREATE_BY, g.CREATE_TIME,g.UPDATE_BY, g.UPDATE_TIME from c_ground_survey g
g.STAUTE ='02' and g.CODE LIKE concat( #{code}, '%') and g.CODE_ID LIKE concat('%', #{codeId}, '%') and g.SAMPLE_NUMBER = #{sampleNumber} and g.PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME =#{provincialLevelName} and g.CITY_LEVEL_NAME= #{cityLevelName} and g.COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME= #{countyLevelName}
select Count(*) from c_ground_survey where COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME= #{code} and CREATE_TIME>=#{data};
mapper.insert:
insert into c_ground_survey
CODE_ID, SAMPLE_NUMBER, PROVINCIAL_LEVEL_NAME, CITY_LEVEL_NAME, COUNTY_LEVEL_NAME, SURVEY_TIME, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, ELEVATION, TOPOGRAPHY_TYPE, SLOPE_POSITION_TYPE, ASCEPT_TYPE, FALLING_GRADIENT, SOIL_TYPE, GRASSLAND_TYPE, VEGETATION_COVERAGE, ABOVE_GROUND_BIOMASS, SURFACE_FEATURES_TYPE, MIAN_BOTANY_TYPE, NATURAL_ENEMY_TYPE, NAME, PHOTO_URL, STAUTE, MAP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, DEPT, CODE,
#{codeId}, #{sampleNumber}, #{provincialLevelName}, #{cityLevelName}, #{countyLevelName}, #{surveyTime}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{elevation}, #{topographyType}, #{slopePositionType}, #{asceptType}, #{fallingGradient}, #{soilType}, #{grasslandType}, #{vegetationCoverage}, #{aboveGroundBiomass}, #{surfaceFeaturesType}, #{mianBotanyType}, #{naturalEnemyType}, #{name}, #{photoUrl}, #{staute}, #{mapId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{dept}, #{code},
mapper.delete:
delete from c_ground_survey where GROUND_ID in
#{groundId}
